mapper.select: SELECT c.cm_no AS cmNo , c.cm_product AS cmProduct , c.cm_company AS cmCompany , c.cm_content AS cmContent , c.cm_count AS cmCount , DATE_FORMAT(c.cm_date,'%p %Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS cmDate , DATE_FORMAT(c.cm_servicestart,'%p %Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS cmServiceStart , DATE_FORMAT(c.cm_serviceend,'%p %Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS cmServiceEnd , c.cm_status AS cmStatus , u.user_nickname as userNickname FROM cm AS c INNER JOIN user AS u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY cm_no DESC
